
BaKoMa TeX 9.70 includes new version of BibEdit.

This version has new features:

	1) Search feature (just enter desired string in search control)
	2) Auto save of modified BIB-files more consistent with TeXWord and Centaur.
	3) Faster load of long BIB-files
	4) Improved appearance: resizable subwindows, consistent buttons, etc.
	5) Finally, it is portable and work also under Mac and Linux.

So, in case if users will found bugs in new program 
we will provide ZIP file with old version.
